//generated function structure for custom log ABAPAuditLog_CL 
//generated on 2022-05-07 
//Sentinel4SAP solution version 1.2.98 
let D_ABAPAuditLog_CL = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime 
,SAL_DATE:string
,SAL_TIME:string
,UpdatedOn_t:datetime
,AuditClassID:real
,AlertSeverityText:string
,SystemID:string
,Instance:string
,MonitoringObjectName:string
,MonitorShortName:string
,MessageText:string
,MessageClass:string
,MessageID:string
,MessageContainerID:string
,AlertValue:real
,AlertSeverity:real
,ClientID:string
,User:string
,Variable1:string
,Variable2:string
,Variable3:string
,Variable4:string
,TerminalIPv6:string
,TransactionCode:string
,ABAPProgramName:string
,SAPProcesType:string
,SAPWPName:string
,Email:string
,SystemNumber:string
,Host:string
,Type:string
,Computer: string
,TERM_IPV6: string 
)['1000-01-01T00:00:00Z','initialString','initialString','1000-01-01T00:00:00Z',1.1111,'initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString',1.1111,1.1111,'initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString'];

let T_ABAPAuditLog_CL = (ABAPAuditLog_CL | project 
TimeGenerated = column_ifexists('TimeGenerated', '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
,SAL_DATE = strcat(column_ifexists('SAL_DATE_s', ''), column_ifexists('MSCDATE_s', ''))
,SAL_TIME = strcat(column_ifexists('SAL_TIME_s', ''), column_ifexists('MSCTIME_s', ''))
,UpdatedOn_t = column_ifexists('UpdatedOn_t', '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
,AuditClassID = column_ifexists('AuditClassID_d', 1.1111)
,AlertSeverityText = column_ifexists('AlertSeverityText_s', 'initialString')
,SystemID = column_ifexists('SystemID_s', 'initialString')
,Instance = column_ifexists('Instance_s', 'initialString')
,MonitoringObjectName = column_ifexists('MonitoringObjectName_s', 'initialString')
,MonitorShortName = column_ifexists('MonitorShortName_s', 'initialString')
,MessageText = column_ifexists('MessageText_s', 'initialString')
,MessageClass = column_ifexists('MessageClass_s', 'initialString')
,MessageID = column_ifexists('MessageID_s', 'initialString')
,MessageContainerID = column_ifexists('MessageContainerID_s', 'initialString')
,AlertValue = column_ifexists('AlertValue_d', 1.1111)
,AlertSeverity = column_ifexists('AlertSeverity_d', 1.1111)
,ClientID = column_ifexists('ClientID_s', 'initialString')
,User = column_ifexists('User_s', 'initialString')
,Variable1 = column_ifexists('Variable1_s', 'initialString')
,Variable2 = column_ifexists('Variable2_s', 'initialString')
,Variable3 = column_ifexists('Variable3_s', 'initialString')
,Variable4 = column_ifexists('Variable4_s', 'initialString')
,TerminalIPv6 = column_ifexists('TerminalIPv6_s', 'initialString')
,TransactionCode = column_ifexists('TransactionCode_s', 'initialString')
,ABAPProgramName = column_ifexists('ABAPProgramName_s', 'initialString')
,SAPProcesType = column_ifexists('SAPProcesType_s', 'initialString')
,SAPWPName = column_ifexists('SAPWPName_s', 'initialString')
,Email = column_ifexists('Email_s', 'initialString')
,SystemNumber = column_ifexists('SystemNumber_s', 'initialString')
,Host = column_ifexists('Host_s', 'initialString')
,Type = column_ifexists('Type', 'initialString')
,Computer= column_ifexists('Computer', 'initialString')
,TERM_IPV6= column_ifexists('TERM_IPV6_s', 'initialString')
| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), User, Email)
| extend Host = iff(isempty(Host), TerminalIPv6, Host)
);

T_ABAPAuditLog_CL | union isfuzzy= true (D_ABAPAuditLog_CL  | where TimeGenerated != '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
